name: Bob's basement
description:
you play as a detective investigating the disappearance of your friend named billy but you call him bob one day at bobs house you go into his basement and get lost in the dark.

f to turn flashlight on g to turn it off

c to crouch x to stand

e to interact and q to undo your interact

2 to go into third person 1 for first

and left click to shoot

game was created by ayuguplays, and Smoked_Elephant(brrrrDev) for the UDC#19 game jam
